name: Morrison
tagline: Do great work. Be good people.
description:
Headquartered in Atlanta, Morrison is an independent, digital-centric, multi-service agency with deep technology and creative capabilities. Founded in 1986, we are the longest standing independent agency in the city.
We offer the following services: 
• Advertising
• Brand Positioning & Messaging
• Content Creation
• Data Science
• Digital Strategy & Development
• Marketing Automation/CRM
• Measurement/Analytics
• Media
• Media Planning & Buying
• Public Relations
• Sales Support
• Search
• Social
• Technology Development
• User Experience
• User Interface
• Video
• Visual Design
We also provide clients with global reach through our partnership in the international ICOM network of 80 agencies in 60 countries.
